titleSection.name: VersionOne Integration with CaseConnect
titleSection.shortDescription: link VersionOne Defects with salesforce.com Cases

descriptionSection.description: CaseConnect affords the ability to link VersionOne Defects with salesforce.com Cases. Using this integration your organization can leverage its investment in salesforce.com Cases Management as part of an integrated platform for Agile development.

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
